name: Conutti! (Prototype)
description:
Conutti!

Welcome to Conutti! A cute prototype game exposing and criticizing the struggle of living during this time of pandemic in a funny manner to form a modern satire with little hamsters.

This prototype was made at Concordia University By Alexandra Melançon & Gordon Gray in the Computation Arts program. There is no intentions of developing this project further at this moment. 

Links to authors pages:

  • Alexandra Melançon  https://xeasierra.itch.io/
  • Gordon Gray: https://gmangray4.itch.io/

Thank you for playing our prototype.
